name: evershop
description: Evershop is a headless e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. It provides an admin panel, storefront, and APIs for building customized online stores that can be self-hosted or extended as needed.
features: Headless Commerce: Flexible e-commerce with modern architecture. Build custom storefronts.
Admin Panel: Manage products, orders, and customers easily. Complete store control.
API-First: RESTful APIs for any frontend. Universal integration.
Storefront Included: Ready-to-use shop interface. Start selling quickly.
Extensible Platform: Customize and extend as needed. Grow with your business.
Self-Hosted: Own your e-commerce platform completely. No transaction fees ever.
